name: 3D Auto Shooter Proto
description:
Made in four days on the side during the organizing of the
International College Jam #1

Theme: "Walk on the Wild Side"

I kept seeing interesting looking auto-shooters everywhere, and thought I would take a crack at it. Also, why not go full 3D? This was quite ambitious and a test.

Too much time was spent getting the basics up and running, so the proto is very bare bones. No audio, no progression, and only one type of weapon and enemy. It works though, and can be fun for a while. I might keep working on this later.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse to look with the camera
  • Aiming and firing is automatic

Goal:

  • One kill, one point
  • Try to get your high score!
  • Stay alive by not getting hit (you have 10 health)
